transport.question: I go 'Choo Choo!' What am I?

hints.text: 🛤️ I travel on tracks.
💨 I can be very long.
👦 Children love to play with toy versions of me.

transport.question: I have wheels and go 'Vroom!' on the road. What am I?

hints.text: 🚦 I stop at red lights.
👪 Many families have one.
🔑 You need a key to start me.

transport.question: I float on water. What am I?

hints.text: 🌊 I can be big or small.
⚓ I need an anchor.
🦆 Ducks also like water, but I'm not a duck!

transport.question: I take lots of people to school. What am I?

hints.text: 🚏 I stop at bus stops.
💛 I am often yellow.
🚌 I am bigger than a car.

transport.question: I fly in the sky and take people to far away places. What am I?

hints.text: ☁️ I fly above the clouds.
💺 I have seats for passengers.
✈️ I have wings.

transport.question: I have two wheels and you pedal to make me go. What am I?

hints.text: 👧 You can ride me with training wheels.
🛎️ I might have a bell.
🛣️ I am good for riding on bike paths.

transport.question: I help people who are sick or hurt and go 'Wee Woo!' What am I?

hints.text: 🚑 I have a siren.
🏥 I go to the hospital.
🔴 I am usually white with red.

transport.question: I help put out fires and have a long ladder. What am I?

hints.text: 🚒 I am red.
🧑‍🚒 Firefighters ride in me.
💦 I use water to stop fires.

transport.question: I go under the water and can carry people and things. What am I?

hints.text: 🤿 You need special equipment to breathe inside me.
🚢 I can be used for exploring the ocean.
🕳️ I travel underwater

transport.question: I fly but I'm not an airplane. I have spinning blades on top. What am I?

hints.text: 🚁 I can hover in one spot.
🚨 Sometimes I am used for rescues.
⬆️ My blades help me go up and down.

animal.question: I say 'meow' and like to drink milk. What am I?

hints.text: 🥛 I like to drink something white and yummy!
🧶 I love to play with string!
🐈 I have soft fur and whiskers.

animal.question: I say 'woof' and like to play fetch. What am I?

hints.text: 🦴 I love to chew on bones!
🎾 I like to chase after a ball.
🐕 I wag my tail when I'm happy.

animal.question: I quack and swim in the water. What am I?

hints.text: 🌾 I like to eat seeds.
💛 I am often yellow when I am young.
🦆 I have webbed feet to help me swim.

animal.question: I go 'moo' and give you milk. What am I?

hints.text: 🌱 I like to eat grass.
🐄 I have a big pink nose.
🥛 People drink what I make.

animal.question: I say 'baa' and have fluffy wool. What am I?

hints.text: ☁️ My coat is very soft!
🐑 I am often found on a farm.
🌿 I like to eat grass in a field.

animal.question: I have a long trunk and big ears. What am I?

hints.text: 🥜 I like to eat peanuts!
🐘 I am a very big animal.
🚿 I use my nose to spray water.

animal.question: I hop around and love carrots. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 I love to munch on orange vegetables.
🐇 I have long ears and a fluffy tail.
🌱 I like to live in a burrow.

animal.question: I swing from trees and eat bananas. What am I?

hints.text: 🐒 I make funny faces.
🍌 I love to peel and eat yellow fruit.
🌴 I like to live in the jungle.

animal.question: I roar loudly and have a big mane. What am I?

hints.text: 👑 I am called king.
🦁 I have a furry mane around my head.
🥩 I eat meat and live in Africa.

animal.question: I am tall and have spots all over. What am I?

hints.text: 🍃 I can reach the tallest leaves.
🦒 I have a very long neck.
🌍 I live in Africa.
